questions.content: What is the capital of France?
questions.explanation: Paris is the capital of France.

questions.content: Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
questions.explanation: Mars is called the Red Planet due to its reddish appearance.

questions.content: What is the chemical formula for glucose?
questions.explanation: Glucose has the molecular formula C6H12O6.

templateInfo.name: Technical Template
templateInfo.description: Focuses on technical concepts and implementation details

questions.content: Which of these is a valid REST API HTTP method?
questions.explanation: PUT is a standard HTTP method used in REST APIs for updating resources.
Standard JSON does not support comments.

questions.content: What JavaScript method would you use to convert a JSON string to an object?
questions.explanation: JSON.parse() method parses a JSON string and returns a JavaScript object.
